4 Line – UPDATED Weekday Planned Service Change

The following planned service change is ADDED: 10:45 AM to 3 PM, Wednesday, Apr 8 Woodlawn-bound 4 service runs express from 149 St-Grand Concourse to Burnside Av. • To 161 St, 167 St, 170 St, Mt Eden Av, and 176 St, take the Woodlawn-bound 4 to Burnside Av and transfer to a Manhattan-bound 4. • From these stations, take a Manhattan-bound 4 to 149 St-Grand Concourse and transfer to a Woodlawn-bound 4. This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay. For more information, click on the mta.info link in this email and read station signs.

Get More on the Go With Metro-North’s Upgraded Train Time App!

“Info on the go” just got better, thanks to new upgrades to Metro-North’s Train Time app! The enhanced range of travel information, as well as easier search and navigation options, are designed to make customers’ travels easy with a few swipes of their smartphones! Through the enhanced Train Time app, you can now: • Search by arrival times • Use the enhanced “favorites” editing • Explore larger maps • Reverse your favorite trips • Find your station using a simplified search process • Receive improved service alerts Our Train Time app is available for iPhone and Android smartphones. For complete details, visit http://bit.ly/1s3fjbQ .
